
   // degree =  3   => absolute accuracy is  -6 bits
template<> inline float approx_atan2s_P< 3 >(float x){
 return  (-2.244090191449998883399530313909053802490234375e-10) + x * ((-10142.439453125) + x * (2.42150832718834863044321537017822265625e-8 + x * 2002.0908203125)) ;
}
   // degree =  5   => absolute accuracy is  -3 bits
template<> inline float approx_atan2s_P< 5 >(float x){
 return  (-6.7420925748762697282678857391147175803780555725098e-15) + x * ((-10381.9609375) + x * (9.99565881454334004274642211385071277618408203125e-13 + x * (3011.1513671875 + x * ((-4.259869366973756399374906322918832302093505859375e-12) + x * (-827.538330078125))))) ;
}
   // degree =  7   => absolute accuracy is  0 bits
template<> inline float approx_atan2s_P< 7 >(float x){
 return  (-1.56982786636566820984151071627366036409512162208557e-16) + x * ((-10422.177734375) + x * (3.327026154575918326372629962861537933349609375e-14 + x * (3349.97412109375 + x * ((-3.1619216793454807401531070354394614696502685546875e-13) + x * ((-1525.589599609375) + x * (5.1441739323115909243711030285339802503585815429687e-13 + x * 406.64190673828125)))))) ;
}
   // degree =  9   => absolute accuracy is  3 bits
template<> inline float approx_atan2s_P< 9 >(float x){
 return  (-8.7912754853647356867440976202487945556640625e-10) + x * ((-10428.984375) + x * (5.78112349103321321308612823486328125e-8 + x * (3445.20654296875 + x * ((-5.209354867474758066236972808837890625e-7) + x * ((-1879.137939453125) + x * (1.368466882922803051769733428955078125e-6 + x * (888.22314453125 + x * ((-1.046437091645202599465847015380859375e-6) + x * (-217.42669677734375))))))))) ;
}
